seed_pair.target: Esta no es la mejor opción que podría hacer.
seed_pair.known: This isn't the best choice I could make.

S0106: No necesitamos sentirnos felices, solo necesitamos trabajar duro
We don't need to feel happy, we just need to work hard.
S0107: Esperábamos ver lo que estabas haciendo
We hoped to see what you were doing.
S0108: No esperábamos despertar en el medio de la noche
We didn't hope to wake in the middle of the night.
S0109: Debemos trabajar duro para aprender muchas palabras nuevas
We must work hard to learn a lot of new words.
S0110: Somos amigos, y después de que terminemos me gustaría relajarme
We're friends, and after we finish I'd like to relax.
S0111: Cuando aprendemos algo nuevo cambia nuestro cerebro
When we learn something new it changes our brain.
S0112: Eso fue muy interesante, y no estaba esperándolo
That was very interesting, and I wasn't expecting it.
S0113: ¿Por qué no puedo recordar lo que dijiste?
Why can't I remember what you said?
S0114: Siento como si estuviera haciendo peor hoy que ayer.
I feel as if I'm doing worse today than yesterday.
S0115: No siento como si estuviera preparado para tener una conversación.
I don't feel as if I'm ready to have a conversation.

_instructions.task: Generate 12-15 practice phrases per LEGO using recent seed_pairs as pattern inspiration
_instructions.pattern_matching: Use recent_seed_pairs as full sentence examples showing patterns and vocabulary
_instructions.overgeneration: Generate 12-15 phrases knowing some may be filtered by GATE validation
_instructions.quality: Semantic meaning + syntactic correctness + pedagogical value
_instructions.format: Array format: ["English phrase", "Spanish phrase", null, lego_count]
